content: I am getting an error in my code that says this: aesop: maximum number of rule applications (200) reached. Set the 'maxRuleApplications' option to increase the limit. How do I increase the maxRuleApplications option?
Nevermind found it you are supposed to do aesop (config := { maxRuleApplications := 10 })
Colin ⚛️ has marked this topic as resolved.
